conbody.p: This is a Getting Started guide for the ‘Codescape GNU tools for nanoMIPS’ (henceforth called ‘’ in this manual).
This document is divided up into the following sections:

dlentry.dd: Describes the installation options and how to install the toolchain.
Explains how to target a specific ISA or core when compiling with the toolchain.
Describes what type of programs can be run on IASim (Instruction Accurate Simulator), the build and start options that should be used and the versions of IASim that are compatible with .
Describes what type of programs can be run on QEMU simulator, the build and start options that should be used and the versions of QEMU that are compatible with .
